page.title: 13Ruins in our area
page.content:
Frith Hall
Frith Hall is a ruin and it belongs to my family.It was built in 1680 and has been a hunting lodge,inn farm.We have an old notice about poachers at Frith Hall being punished in 1800.The ghost of William Marshall haunts it.He died in 1736.
Old Hall Old Hall is a very old ruin.It had a pele tower and the walls were six feet thick.A story says that one of the last wolves in England was chasing a lady at Old Hall.She fell in a deep dub and drowned. Grime Crag Is near Lowerys.It was occupied in 1881.It says in the church records that someone was buried there.
